query:
UPDATE trip_routes r
JOIN trips t ON r.tripId = t.id
SET r.date = r.date + (2 * 365 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
WHERE (t.name LIKE '%Slovakia%' OR t.destination LIKE '%Slovakia%')
  AND YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.date/1000)) = 2024;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute 
UPDATE trip_routes r
JOIN trips t ON r.tripId = t.id
SET r.date = r.date + (2 * 365 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
WHERE (t.name LIKE '%Slovakia%' OR t.destination LIKE '%Slovakia%')
  AND YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.date/1000)) = 2024;
